text: hi folks my name is Pam Hill and I'm a
developer Advocate at Jed brains so this
October I gave a talk at goto Copenhagen
about 10 reasons to try cotton
multiplatform coton multiplatform is a
technology by Jade brains that allows
development teams to share common code
between different platforms Now spoiler
here's three reasons why you should try
cotland multiplatform first it's already
used by big companies like metup Netflix
and Phillips second one is that it's
already supporting several well quite an
extensive list of platforms like server
mobile web and even desktop and the
third one is that it has a very
supportive Community we'll also be doing
live coding during the presentation
where I'll show you just how easy it is
to create an app with cotlin and compose
multiplatform
